loginPage.title: WEMUKELEKILE FUTSI!
loginPage.subtitle: Ngicela ufake imininingwane yakho kutsi ungene.
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: Ungene ngemphumelelo, kodvwa kute ithokheni letfolakele. Ngicela utsintse lusito.
loginPage.errorDefault: Kungena kuhlulekile. Ngicela uhlole imininingwane yakho.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Kwenteke liphutsa lelingakatfolakali kwinethiwekhi. Ngicela utame futsi.
